notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: SWK, as a corresponding author, substantially contributed to the article as the conception and design of the work and manuscript revision. IK, as the first author, substantially contributed to the article as literature research, case collection and writing the manuscript. HJC, JMR, SKL, JHY, JEL, SJN and HJS were contributors in case collection and interpretation of data. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
